name: SDLReader
description: A lightweight, cross-platform document viewer built with SDL2 and MuPDF. Supports viewing PDF, CBZ/ZIP comic archives, EPUB books, and MOBI e-books with intuitive navigation, zooming, rotation, and mirroring features. Optimized for TrimUI Brick (TG5040) running NextUI.
author: Helaas

changelog.v1.0.0: Initial release with PDF, CBZ, EPUB, and MOBI support, optimized for TrimUI Brick
